
A rushed engineer reused a prime in two users' RSA keys. Both received encrypted secrets: 270556345500981918005890774130610003593150612223359935207606647510886266176968007465961274686965859035012881348100993358501176702050922604978338674267537772286379715424964099453379283548920404033949334079731652198167363117553268531. Can you exploit the repeated prime to recover both messages?


The flag format is flag{...}
n=411539460868801054738170822166306731012525251876896524661769686048795555776566413525459059991721561695346965250387166790478555024201807194780778959287531707785716101075698908687912103842109305914111567858328972675615323700728948569, e=91127912928504394444327777946349850337064654845033389496305231768015001551060643746001676640445423221268198379706237542497323326233958654764342219146247035673407955114846683000741350044210287764903549766199518165899778669334117377

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{46w3xgr5}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 270556345500981918005890774130610003593150612223359935207606647510886266176968007465961274686965859035012881348100993358501176702050922604978338674267537772286379715424964099453379283548920404033949334079731652198167363117553268531
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=411539460868801054738170822166306731012525251876896524661769686048795555776566413525459059991721561695346965250387166790478555024201807194780778959287531707785716101075698908687912103842109305914111567858328972675615323700728948569, e=91127912928504394444327777946349850337064654845033389496305231768015001551060643746001676640445423221268198379706237542497323326233958654764342219146247035673407955114846683000741350044210287764903549766199518165899778669334117377
extra_info: p=20286435390891152189684337390658939755794534625263501958314235340378323944584601526313621855022712649747684573946587, q=20286435390891152189684337390658939755794534625263501958314235340378323944584601526313621855022712649747684573946587, Ï†(n)=411539460868801054738170822166306731012525251876896524661769686048795555776566413525459059991721561695346965250387126217607773241897427826105997641408020118716465574071782280217231347194220136711058940614618927250315828331581055396
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
